show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
Stay Tied to the Facts, But Free Your Mind! <!--more--> Well, there ought to be no shortage of well-thought-out opinions about this week’s news issues, events and developments.
Pick a topic from your extensive “What’s [Still] Grinding My Gears” menu and break it down for us.
Prove that they got it wrong, but you have it right.
Of course, you’re all the more impressive when you can back up what you say, so stay tied to the facts even as you free your mind.
